程序包 weather

类 StevensonReading

java.lang.Object
weather.StevensonReading
所有已实现的接口:
WeatherReading
public class StevensonReading extends Object implements WeatherReading
Readings represented as the air temperature in Celsius, the dew point temperature in Celsius which cannot be greater than the air temperature, the non-negative wind speed in miles per hour, and the non-negative total rain received in the last 24 hours in millimeters.
作者:
ZongyuWu

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    StevensonReading(int temperature, int dewPoint, int windSpeed, int totalRain)
    Constructs a weather reading in terms of temperature, dew point temperature, wind speed and total rain.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    int
    getDewPoint()
    Get the dew point (in Celsius) for this reading rounded to the nearest integer.
    int
    getHeatIndex()
    Get the heat index (in Celsius) for this weather reading rounded to the nearest integer.
    int
    getRelativeHumidity()
    Get the relative humidity (in percent) of this weather reading rounded to the nearest integer.
    int
    getTemperature()
    Get the temperature (in Celsius) of this reading rounded to the nearest integer.
    int
    getTotalRain()
    Get the total rain (in mm) of this reading.
    int
    getWindChill()
    Get the wind chill (in Celsius) rounded to the nearest integer.
    int
    getWindSpeed()
    Get the wind speed (in Celsius) for this reading rounded to the nearest integer.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • StevensonReading

      public StevensonReading(int temperature, int dewPoint, int windSpeed, int totalRain) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a weather reading in terms of temperature, dew point temperature, wind speed and total rain.
      参数:
      temperature - the air temperature
      dewPoint - the dew point temperature
      windSpeed - the wind speed
      totalRain - the total rain
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is negative
